description: Ed is a horse villager who first appeared in Doubutsu no Mori as a jock villager, but was given a smug personality in Animal Crossing: New Leaf. He has appeared in most of the games in the Animal Crossing series, with the exceptions of Wild World and Pocket Camp. His initial phrase, greenhorn, is a slang word to refer to amateurs, relating to both his original jock personality and his current smug personality.
